text: hi guys how do you see your failures is
it a time for you to start talking
negative to yourself and start hating
yourself condemning yourself or is it a
time when you motivate yourself to try
again
well if your answer is that it's a time
to hate yourself then you are traveling
down on dangerous route mind it please
you cannot hate yourself for not having
been successful failure is the way to
success yes that is true and you must be
wondering how do I become successful why
do I often fail we all do it's not a new
thing and you shouldn't be shocked if
you fail because every failure can
actually be turned into success through
some interesting ways for example by
talking positive to yourself because you
are always listening to yourself so you
have to be your best encouragement you
have to be your best motivator how do
you do that you must be like it's so
easy to say but it's harder to do it I
know it is and that's why I've got some
tips and advices for you to turn every
failure into your success so to find out
how would you do this watch the complete
session with me on skillopedia the place
to learn skills for the real world this
is Michelle
[Music]
